import React from 'react' import './Post.css' import Comment from '../../img/comment.png' import Heart from '../../img/like.png' import share from '../../img/share.png' import NotLike from '../../img/notlike.png' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Post = ({data}) => { const user = useSelector((state) => state.auth.userData); return (
{console.log(data)}
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.desc}
) } export default Post
